name: will-finance-5.0
description: Sistema de Gerenciamento Financeiro Cyberpunk Completo

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:generate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:deploy: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:system && npm run test:validation
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:client -- --fix && npm run lint:server -- --fix
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup

author: William
